email_content:
Hi Fredrik,

I hope you've been doing well!

I wanted to stay in touch and reconnect after our last conversation about how Remote Helpers could support Mtec Sverige AB and your other companies with flexible remote staffing solutions. It was great learning more about your work in construction, consulting, and retail, and how your teams are expanding across Sweden.

From our side, we can assist you with:
üë∑ Designers and developers ‚Äî for website updates, app improvements, or automation tools.
üí° Marketing and lead generation specialists ‚Äî to help manage outreach, social media, and communication with partners.
‚öôÔ∏è Technical support and AI assistants ‚Äî to streamline workflows, automate reporting, and improve efficiency across your teams.

Our collaboration model is simple and flexible ‚Äî you can start part-time or project-based, with a 3-day free trial to test the fit before making a commitment.

üìÖ Would Wednesday or Thursday at 12:00 or 13:00 CET work for a short follow-up call to continue the discussion and review a few profiles?

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Best regards
